questions.text: Descriptive analytics tells you…
options: what is most likely to occur in the future.
which actions you can perform to affect outcomes.
why something occurred in the past.
questions.explanation: La analítica descriptiva se centra en resumir datos históricos para responder qué pasó, por eso la opción correcta es 'what occurred in the past'.

questions.text: Normalization involves eliminating relationships between database tables.
questions.explanation: La normalización no elimina relaciones, las organiza y define mediante claves primarias y foráneas para reducir redundancia.

questions.text: Normalizing a database reduces data redundancy.
questions.explanation: Uno de los objetivos principales de la normalización es evitar datos duplicados y redundantes distribuyéndolos en varias tablas relacionadas.

questions.text: Normalization improves data integrity.
questions.explanation: Al separar los datos y aplicar reglas de integridad referencial, la normalización ayuda a mantener la información coherente y confiable.

questions.text: In an extract, transform, and load (ETL) process, when are the data transformations applied?
options: After the data is loaded into the target system
Before the data is loaded into the target system
Only when the target is a relational database
questions.explanation: En ETL clásico, los datos se extraen, se transforman en un motor intermedio y luego se cargan al destino ya procesados.

questions.text: In batch processing…
options: data is always inserted one row at a time.
data is processed in real time.
latency in delivering data processing results is acceptable.
questions.explanation: En el procesamiento por lotes se acepta cierta latencia, porque los datos se acumulan y se procesan en bloques en lugar de en tiempo real.

questions.text: Transcribing audio files into text is an example of which type of analytics?
questions.explanation: Convertir audio a texto requiere servicios de IA que entienden lenguaje hablado, es decir, capacidades cognitivas.

questions.text: Which type of analytics best answers the question 'Why did sales increase last month?'
questions.explanation: La analítica diagnóstica analiza causas y factores que explican por qué ocurrió un resultado específico en el pasado.

questions.text: Which type of analytics best answers the question 'How do I allocate my budget to buy different inventory items?'
questions.explanation: La analítica prescriptiva recomienda acciones concretas, como la mejor forma de distribuir un presupuesto.

questions.text: In the given JSON document, the "customer" element (that contains first name, last name, address, etc.) is…
questions.explanation: En el ejemplo, el objeto principal de nivel superior es "customer", por lo que actúa como root object del JSON.

questions.text: In the same JSON document, the "address" element is…
questions.explanation: "address" contiene pares clave-valor dentro de "customer", así que es un objeto anidado (nested object).

questions.text: In the same JSON document, the "social media" element is…
questions.explanation: "social media" contiene una colección de objetos similares en una lista, por lo que es un arreglo anidado (nested array).

questions.text: A data model with one central fact table (Sales) connected to dimension tables such as Customer, Product, SalesPerson and Warehouse is an example of…
questions.explanation: Un esquema con una tabla de hechos central y varias dimensiones alrededor es un star schema típico de data warehousing.

questions.text: In that star schema, the Customer table is considered a…
questions.explanation: Customer almacena atributos descriptivos sobre los clientes, por lo que es una dimensión, no una tabla de hechos.

questions.text: In Azure Synapse Analytics dedicated SQL pools, the massively parallel processing (MPP) engine…
options: distributes processing across control nodes only.
redirects client connections across compute nodes.
redirects client connections across control nodes.
questions.explanation: El motor MPP divide las consultas entre múltiples nodos de cómputo para procesar grandes volúmenes de datos en paralelo.

questions.text: Which database object sorts and stores the data rows in a table based on their key values?
questions.explanation: Un clustered index define el orden físico de las filas en la tabla según las columnas clave del índice.

questions.text: A relational database is most appropriate for which scenario?
options: Geographically distributed writes with eventual consistency
Writes that have frequently changing and irregular structures
Transactional writes that require strong consistency
Storing large unstructured binary objects such as videos
questions.explanation: Los motores relacionales están optimizados para transacciones ACID y escrituras consistentes, típicas de escenarios OLTP.

questions.text: Batch processing can output data to a file store.
questions.explanation: Los procesos por lotes suelen escribir resultados en archivos, por ejemplo en almacenamiento de tipo file o blob.

questions.text: Batch processing can output data to a relational database.
questions.explanation: También es común que un proceso batch cargue los resultados en tablas de una base de datos relacional para su posterior análisis.

questions.text: Batch processing can output data to a NoSQL database.
questions.explanation: Nada impide que un flujo batch inserte o actualice datos en un almacén NoSQL; el patrón batch no depende del tipo de destino.

questions.text: In an extract, load, and transform (ELT) process, where do the data transformations typically occur?
options: In a separate transformation engine before loading
Inside the target data warehouse or data store
questions.explanation: En ELT se cargan primero los datos crudos al almacén de destino y allí mismo se ejecutan las transformaciones aprovechando su potencia de cómputo.

questions.text: A visualization that shows a university's current student enrollment versus maximum capacity is an example of…
questions.explanation: Solo muestra el estado actual frente a un límite, es decir, describe qué está pasando, lo cual corresponde a analítica descriptiva.

questions.text: Which visualization type displays colored nested rectangles where size and color represent the relative value of each item?
questions.explanation: Un treemap usa rectángulos anidados cuyo tamaño y color representan magnitudes relativas dentro de una jerarquía.

questions.text: Which two Azure Storage redundancy options replicate data to a secondary region? (Select the best single correct answer for the exam.)
options: Geo-redundant storage (GRS) and read-access geo-redundant storage (RA-GRS)
questions.explanation: GRS y RA-GRS replican los datos de la cuenta de almacenamiento a una región secundaria emparejada de Azure para recuperación ante desastres.

questions.text: Which statement is an example of Data Manipulation Language (DML)?
options: GRANT SELECT ON Products TO user1;
questions.explanation: INSERT modifica los datos (filas) dentro de una tabla, por lo que es una instrucción DML; CREATE y ALTER son DDL, GRANT es DCL.

questions.text: Which language is typically used to query and manipulate data in a relational database?
questions.explanation: T-SQL es la extensión de SQL utilizada por Microsoft SQL Server para consultar y modificar datos en bases relacionales.

questions.text: Which type of processing is best suited for analyzing data from millions of IoT devices sending temperature updates every second?
questions.explanation: Los flujos IoT requieren procesamiento en tiempo real, lo cual corresponde a stream processing.

questions.text: Which Azure service is designed for real-time analytics on streaming data from sources such as Event Hubs?
questions.explanation: Azure Stream Analytics está optimizado para consultas en tiempo real sobre datos que llegan en streaming.

questions.text: Which data storage approach is best suited for large-scale unstructured logs from applications?
questions.explanation: Los registros de aplicaciones suelen ser archivos grandes y sin estructura, ideales para almacenarse en Azure Blob Storage.

questions.text: In a relational database, which constraint ensures that no two rows have the same value in a specific column?
questions.explanation: La restricción UNIQUE garantiza que no existan valores duplicados en la columna especificada.

questions.text: Which statement about Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 is correct?
options: It is optimized only for transactional workloads.
It combines hierarchical namespaces with blob storage.
It only supports structured relational files.
questions.explanation: ADLS Gen2 combina la escalabilidad de Blob Storage con un sistema jerárquico de carpetas para big data analytics.

questions.text: Which type of database is most appropriate for storing relationships such as 'user follows user'?
questions.explanation: Las bases de datos gráficas modelan relaciones complejas como redes sociales de forma eficiente.

questions.text: Which SQL operation is considered Data Definition Language (DDL)?
questions.explanation: CREATE TABLE define la estructura de objetos en la base de datos, por lo tanto es DDL.

questions.text: Azure Cosmos DB provides guaranteed low latency backed by which feature?
questions.explanation: Cosmos DB ofrece baja latencia global mediante replicación multi-master en múltiples regiones.

questions.text: Which type of data storage uses partitions and keys to scale horizontally?
questions.explanation: Los almacenes key-value se diseñan para particionar datos automáticamente y escalar de forma horizontal.

questions.text: Which Azure service is most commonly used for orchestration of ETL and ELT pipelines?
questions.explanation: Azure Data Factory está hecho para orquestar pipelines ETL/ELT entre múltiples orígenes de datos.

questions.text: Which statement describes a benefit of cloud-based data solutions?
options: All workloads must run on physical servers.
Resources scale automatically based on demand.
Data must be structured before storage.
questions.explanation: La nube permite escalabilidad automática dependiendo de la carga del sistema.

questions.text: Which SQL keyword is used to remove duplicate rows in a result set?
questions.explanation: DISTINCT elimina filas duplicadas en un conjunto de resultados.

questions.text: Which Azure service allows you to run big data Apache Spark workloads?
questions.explanation: Azure Databricks es un entorno gestionado basado en Spark para big data y machine learning.

questions.text: Which term describes data that arrives in unpredictable intervals and in varying structure?
questions.explanation: El streaming data llega continuamente y en momentos impredecibles, a menudo con diferentes formatos.

questions.text: Which storage option is recommended for high-performance OLTP workloads?
questions.explanation: Azure SQL Database ofrece ACID y alto rendimiento para transacciones OLTP.

questions.text: Which statement best describes a columnstore index?
options: Optimized for transactional workloads with many small writes.
Stores data column by column for high-compression analytics workloads.
Sorts data physically on disk by primary key.
Stores row data in heap format.
questions.explanation: Los columnstore indexes almacenan datos por columna y son ideales para analítica a gran escala.

questions.text: Which Azure service provides distributed NoSQL storage with multiple APIs such as SQL, MongoDB and Cassandra?
questions.explanation: Cosmos DB soporta múltiples APIs NoSQL, incluyendo SQL, MongoDB, Cassandra, Table y Gremlin.

questions.text: Which term represents the smallest unit of data storage in a relational table?
questions.explanation: La celda (cell) es la intersección entre una fila y una columna; es la unidad mínima almacenada.

questions.text: Which element of a JSON document represents a key-value pair?
questions.explanation: En JSON, cada propiedad es un par clave-valor, como "name": "Mario".

questions.text: Which storage option is best suited for time-series data such as temperature readings?
questions.explanation: Los time-series databases optimizan consultas basadas en intervalos de tiempo y alta frecuencia de escritura.

questions.text: Which Azure analytics service supports both SQL and Spark workloads in a unified platform?
questions.explanation: Azure Synapse combina Spark, SQL y pipelines de datos en un workspace unificado.

questions.text: Which Power BI feature enables users to ask questions using natural language?
questions.explanation: Q&A permite formular preguntas en lenguaje natural que Power BI interpreta para generar visualizaciones.

questions.text: Which type of join returns only the rows that match in both tables?
questions.explanation: El INNER JOIN devuelve únicamente los registros que coinciden en ambas tablas.

questions.text: Which Azure service provides a fully managed Apache Spark cluster environment?
questions.explanation: Azure Databricks es un entorno cloud optimizado para Spark gestionado plenamente por Microsoft.

questions.text: Which property of a data warehouse makes it suitable for analytical workloads?
options: Highly normalized schema optimized for transactions
questions.explanation: Los data warehouses están optimizados para consultas analíticas, usando estructuras pre-agrupadas, índices columnar y almacenamiento orientado a lectura.

questions.text: Which workload is most appropriate for Azure SQL Managed Instance?
options: Applications requiring SQL Server Agent and full SQL compatibility
Unstructured storage such as image files
questions.explanation: Azure SQL Managed Instance ofrece compatibilidad casi completa con SQL Server on-premises, incluyendo SQL Agent.

questions.text: Which indexing strategy is best for analytical queries that scan large datasets?
questions.explanation: Los columnstore indexes permiten escanear y comprimir grandes volúmenes de datos de forma eficiente.

questions.text: Which Azure Cosmos DB API is recommended when migrating an existing MongoDB workload?
questions.explanation: Cosmos DB ofrece compatibilidad con aplicaciones MongoDB mediante su API MongoDB.

questions.text: Which characteristic defines semi-structured data?
options: No format and no organizational structure
Flexible schema with key-value pairs or tags
questions.explanation: Los datos semi-estructurados como JSON contienen etiquetas y claves sin un esquema estricto.

questions.text: What is the main advantage of massively parallel processing (MPP) systems?
options: They store all data in a single node
They scale vertically by increasing CPU only
They distribute queries across multiple nodes for faster analytics
They eliminate the need for indexing
questions.explanation: MPP divide las consultas entre varios nodos, permitiendo análisis a escala masiva.

questions.text: Which Azure tool allows monitoring and alerting for database performance metrics?
questions.explanation: Azure Monitor recopila métricas y permite configurar alertas para recursos, incluyendo bases de datos.

questions.text: Which scenario is best suited for a key-value database?
options: Product catalog with images and metadata
Simple lookups where each key maps to a single value
questions.explanation: Los key-value stores se usan para búsquedas rápidas donde cada clave tiene un valor asociado.

questions.text: Which service in Azure Synapse enables querying files in a data lake using T-SQL?
questions.explanation: El serverless SQL pool permite consultar datos en Data Lake con T-SQL sin aprovisionar un clúster dedicado.

questions.text: Which statement describes Azure Databricks?
options: A fast, collaborative Apache Spark-based analytics platform
questions.explanation: Azure Databricks es una plataforma basada en Apache Spark para big data y machine learning.

questions.text: Which type of database is optimized for analytical reporting and aggregations?
questions.explanation: Las bases OLAP están optimizadas para análisis, agregaciones y consultas sobre grandes volúmenes de datos.

questions.text: Which technology is commonly used to capture changes from a database for downstream processing?
questions.explanation: CDC permite detectar cambios en tablas para enviarlos a otros sistemas o pipelines.

questions.text: Which type of file is most suitable for storing structured, columnar analytical data?
questions.explanation: Parquet es un formato columnar optimizado para análisis y compresión eficiente.

questions.text: Which Azure storage replication option offers the highest durability within a single region?
questions.explanation: ZRS replica datos entre zonas dentro de la misma región, brindando alta disponibilidad regional.

questions.text: Which Azure tool is used to create and manage SQL databases through scripts and notebooks?
questions.explanation: Azure Data Studio permite usar notebooks, ejecutar scripts y administrar bases SQL en múltiples plataformas.

questions.text: Which file format is best for hierarchical data with nested objects?
questions.explanation: JSON representa objetos anidados y estructuras jerárquicas naturalmente.

questions.text: Which Azure database supports horizontal scaling through partition keys?
questions.explanation: Cosmos DB escala horizontalmente repartiendo datos entre particiones definidas por una partition key.

questions.text: What does ACID stand for in database systems?
questions.explanation: ACID describe propiedades esenciales para garantizar transacciones confiables en bases relacionales.

questions.text: Which partitioning strategy distributes rows based on column ranges?
questions.explanation: Range partitioning divide los datos según intervalos definidos en una columna.

questions.text: Which Azure service provides near real-time event ingestion at massive scale?
questions.explanation: Event Hubs maneja millones de eventos por segundo ideal para telemetría y análisis en tiempo real.

questions.text: Which computation layer in a data architecture is responsible for transforming raw data into curated datasets?
questions.explanation: El processing layer ejecuta transformaciones ETL/ELT para convertir datos crudos en datasets utilizables.

questions.text: Which Cosmos DB API is designed for graph-based applications?
questions.explanation: Gremlin API permite trabajar con grafos, vértices y aristas.

questions.text: Which consistency level in Azure Cosmos DB provides the lowest latency?
questions.explanation: Eventual consistency ofrece la menor latencia, aunque con lecturas potencialmente desactualizadas.

questions.text: Which Azure storage service supports SMB protocol access?
questions.explanation: Azure Files expone compartidos SMB para acceso como si fuera un file server tradicional.

questions.text: What is the purpose of a foreign key in a relational database?
options: To enforce referential integrity between tables
questions.explanation: Las foreign keys garantizan que las relaciones entre tablas sean válidas y consistentes.

questions.text: Which type of consistency level in Azure Cosmos DB guarantees that reads never see uncommitted or partial writes?
questions.explanation: Strong consistency garantiza lecturas estrictamente actualizadas, evitando lecturas parciales o inconsistentes.

questions.text: Which Azure Storage redundancy option replicates your data across geographically separate regions?
questions.explanation: Geo-Redundant Storage (GRS) replica los datos en una región secundaria para recuperación ante desastres.

questions.text: Which Azure tool allows you to run notebooks with SQL, Python, or PowerShell code?
questions.explanation: Azure Data Studio soporta notebooks interactivos con SQL, Python y PowerShell.

questions.text: Which feature of Azure SQL Database allows administrators to restore data to a previous point in time?
questions.explanation: Point-in-time restore usa backups automáticos para volver a un estado anterior.

questions.text: Which type of operation is optimized in OLTP systems?
questions.explanation: OLTP se optimiza para transacciones cortas, rápidas y consistentes.

questions.text: Which Azure service should you use to collect logs from multiple cloud resources and query them using Kusto Query Language (KQL)?
questions.explanation: Azure Monitor Logs usa Log Analytics y KQL para consultar logs centralizados.

questions.text: Which storage type is optimized for storing massive datasets of unstructured objects?
questions.explanation: Blob Storage es ideal para objetos como imágenes, videos, logs o respaldos.

questions.text: What is the purpose of a clustered index?
options: Physically sort table data by index key
questions.explanation: El índice clustered determina el orden físico de los datos según la clave indexada.

questions.text: Which query language is used for analytical queries in Azure Data Explorer (ADX)?
questions.explanation: Azure Data Explorer utiliza Kusto Query Language (KQL) para análisis de logs y telemetría.

questions.text: Which Azure service enables real-time processing of data streams from devices and applications?
questions.explanation: Stream Analytics procesa datos en tiempo real desde Event Hubs, IoT Hub o Blob Streams.

questions.text: Which data storage format is most efficient for analytical queries on large datasets?
questions.explanation: Los formatos columnar como Parquet y ORC mejoran consultas analíticas y compresión.

questions.text: Which option represents an advantage of ELT over ETL when using cloud data warehouses?
options: Less dependency on destination compute resources
questions.explanation: ELT carga datos primero y transforma después, aprovechando el poder de cómputo del warehouse para cargas masivas.

questions.text: Which Cosmos DB consistency level balances performance and correctness by guaranteeing monotonic reads per user session?
questions.explanation: Session consistency garantiza lecturas consistentes por usuario sin sacrificar latencia.

questions.text: Which SQL keyword is used to remove duplicate rows from a result set?
questions.explanation: DISTINCT elimina duplicados devolviendo solo valores únicos en la consulta.

questions.text: Which Azure messaging service is ideal for decoupling microservices using queue-based communication?
questions.explanation: Service Bus ofrece colas, topics y entrega garantizada para arquitecturas desacopladas.

questions.text: Which SQL statement is used to modify an existing table structure, such as adding a column?
questions.explanation: ALTER TABLE permite agregar, modificar o eliminar columnas y restricciones.

questions.text: Which Azure Cosmos DB model is optimized for graph data with nodes and edges?
questions.explanation: Gremlin API está diseñado para grafos, conexiones y relaciones complejas.

questions.text: Which statement best describes a database view?
options: A physical copy of table data
A virtual table defined by a SQL query
A file stored in a data lake
questions.explanation: Una vista es una tabla virtual generada dinámicamente a partir de una consulta.

questions.text: Which SQL clause is used to filter rows before grouping?
questions.explanation: WHERE filtra las filas antes de aplicar un GROUP BY.

questions.text: Which SQL command permanently deletes all rows from a table, bypassing logging?
questions.explanation: TRUNCATE elimina todas las filas rápidamente y con mínimo registro.

questions.text: Which type of analytics predicts future outcomes using historical data?
questions.explanation: La analítica predictiva modela datos históricos para estimar qué puede ocurrir.

questions.text: Which Azure service allows SQL-like transformations on streaming data?
questions.explanation: Stream Analytics usa un lenguaje tipo SQL para procesar flujos de datos en tiempo real.

questions.text: Which file type is commonly used for big data batch ingestion due to its columnar compression?
questions.explanation: Parquet permite compresión eficiente y escaneo rápido en cargas analíticas.

questions.text: Which Azure service provides fully managed PostgreSQL as a platform as a service?
questions.explanation: Azure Database for PostgreSQL es la versión PaaS totalmente administrada.

questions.text: Which characteristic of data lakes allows storage of any type of data without predefined structure?
questions.explanation: El enfoque schema-on-read permite guardar datos crudos sin esquema previo.

questions.text: Select two benefits of PaaS SQL databases.
questions.explanation: PaaS databases handle backups and scaling automatically.
